title: UK Gordon's Gin Logo?
content:
I need to find the typeface for the logo here...

i've got various scripts on here, but i can't find the right one. any ideas?

cheers people

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [50137x1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110522212535/http:/typophile.com/files/50137x1.jpg) | 7.97 KB |
author: Tom Myers

comments.content: Logos are often hand drawn, particularly those based on calligraphy. So I'll bet this is not a font, but [Shelley](http://web.archive.org/web/20110522212535/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/shelley_script_lt_std_ot/?sample_text=Gordons&sample_size=144&acs_ss=-1&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1) will get you close.
